title: Houkago wa, Apron wo Kite.
original_name: 放課後は、エプロンを着て。
sinopse:
Meiko has it hard, everyday looking after her twin siblings since her mother died. Then there is the cool Hayase-kun that Meiko admires a lot, but there is something about him that only she knows and nobody else in the school....... just what is it?

(Source: Otakumole)
